summary: Scotland is a country in the United Kingdom, making up a third of its land area. It's located in the northern part of Great Britain and includes over 790 islands. Scotland shares a border with England and is surrounded by oceans: the Atlantic Ocean to the north and west, the North Sea to the northeast, and the Irish Sea to the south. The capital is Edinburgh, and Glasgow is the largest city. Scotland has a rich history, dating back to the 9th century as an independent state. It has its own unique culture, legal system, and languages, including Scottish Gaelic and Scots. Geographically, Scotland is known for its Highlands, Lowlands, and Southern Uplands, as well as its many lochs and islands.
title: Scotland
